name: Change the Party from Within Simulator
name_original: Change the Party from Within Simulator
description:
Realized voting for whoever they hand you won't work? You know - you're going to change the party from within!

Sink deep into the dark underworld of how a Presidential Nomination is made. Take your right-fighting right to the top and see just how powerful you are.

This text-based simulation is based on true stories from a handful of troopers from both sides, experienced in 2012 and 2016.

*Incomplete on the Dem side - check back for updates!
